judul: Python Virtual Environments: Managing Dependencies with Virtual Environments
konten: Virtual environments in Python allow you to isolate project dependencies...

contoh.isi:
# Example of creating and activating a virtual environment
# On Windows:
# python -m venv myenv
# myenv\Scripts\activate

# On macOS/Linux:
# python3 -m venv myenv
# source myenv/bin/activate
contoh.komentar: Creates and activates a virtual environment in Python.

topik.topik: Manajemen Dependensi dengan Lingkungan Virtual dalam Python
topik.deskripsi: Menggunakan lingkungan virtual untuk mengisolasi dependensi proyek dalam Python.

error.deskripsi: ModuleNotFoundError occurred due to missing 'venv' module.
error.solusi: Ensure 'venv' module is available in the Python installation.

judul: Python Beautiful Soup: Web Scraping with Beautiful Soup
konten: Beautiful Soup is a library for parsing HTML and XML documents and extracting data...

contoh.isi:
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import requests

# Example of web scraping with Beautiful Soup
url = 'https://example.com'
response = requests.get(url)
html_content = response.text
soup = BeautifulSoup(html_content, 'html.parser')
print(soup.title)
contoh.komentar: Performs web scraping using Beautiful Soup to extract and print the title of a webpage.

topik.topik: Web Scraping dengan Beautiful Soup dalam Python
topik.deskripsi: Menggunakan Beautiful Soup untuk parsing dokumen HTML dan XML serta mengekstrak data dari halaman web.

highlight: library for parsing HTML and XML documents

error.deskripsi: TypeError occurred due to passing invalid parameters to Beautiful Soup constructor.
error.solusi: Ensure valid HTML content (response.text) is passed to BeautifulSoup constructor.
